titleStmt.title: SII 14.225: original edition by A. S. Ramanatha Ayyar
No. 225. (A.R. No. 119 of 1910.) RĀJAŚIṄGAMAṄGALAM, TIRUVADANAI TALUK, RAMANATHAPURAM DISTRICT. ON THE NORTH, WEST AND SOUTH WALLS OF THE KAILĀSANĀTHASVĀMIN TEMPLE.

summary.p: This record comprising of several fragments with intervening portions is dated in the 10th year of the king and relates to the remission of taxes on some lands granted by the king for the expenses of the temple at Rājaśiṅgamaṅgalam, a brahmadēya in Varaguṇa-vaḷanāḍu, on the representation made by Māṉābharaṇaṉ who is styled as ‘nampiḷḷai’ in the inscription.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svastiśrī . tiru maṭantaiyu njayamaṭantaiyan tiruppuyaṅkaḷiliṉitiruppa perumai yeyta ṅkuṭai niḻaṟṟa maṉṉavarellām vantiraiñca marapil varumaṇi muṭi ṉattu Ulakamuḻutuṭaiyāroṭum viṟṟiruntaruḷiya māmutaṟ matikkulam viḷakkiya
komutaṟ koṟcaṭaiyapanmarāṉa tribhuvaṉaccakravattikaḷ koṉerimel ko varakuṇavaḷanāṭṭu brahmadeyam Irājasiṅhamaṅkalattu sabhaiya mpa viyāḻa mutal tevatāṉa Iṟaiyili Āka kuṭutta nilam veliyum Avaṉai cuṭṭiye pe
veṇṭumeṉṟu nāṭṭu nampi Avaṉ kuṭutta Olaiyum Uḷvariyuṅ kāṭṭiṉa � ppattāvatu mutal Inilam veliyum tevatāṉa Iṟaiyili Āka kuṭutta
var koyilil tevarkaṉmikaḷukkum śrīmāheśvaraṟku Ittevaṟku tiruppaṭi mā mantaṅkaḷukku nampiḷḷai māṉāparaṇaṉ kumbha viyāḻa mutal teva

koṉerimel koṇṭāṉ varakuṇavaḷanāṭṭu brahmadeya rājasiṅhamaṅka
uḷvariyum namakkuk kāṭṭiṉamaiyil nām pāṇṭiya Inilam

tirumaṭantaiyum jayamaṭantaiyu
ruḷina koyilil Aḻakiyapāṇṭiyaṉ kūṭattu paḷ
ḷattukku kiḻakkum vaiykaiyāṟṟukku teṟkku
ḻarai Orumāvarai Araikkāṇiyum Ittevaṟkku tiru
Digital edition of SII 14.225 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
